column7: This is similar to BSD-4-Clause, but removes reference to source and binary forms.

column1: Open Data Commons Open Database License
column7: ODbL-1.0 is an approved license specifically for content, but it should be noted that the elements of the covered dataset also must be under terms acceptable to Fedora.
